alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Vilas County through 130 AM CDT... At 1245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winchester, or 18 miles northeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rice Creek Natural Area around 1255 AM CDT. Border Lakes Natural Area around 100 AM CDT. Boulder Junction around 105 AM CDT. Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area around 115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Van Vliet Hemlocks Natural Area, Land O Lakes, Nixon Lake Natural Area, Lac Vieux Desert, Upper Buckatabon Springs Natural Area, Conover, Dunn Lake Natural Area, Presque Isle and High Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
